name: Killzone: Liberation and Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
name_original: Killzone: Liberation and Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
description:
Two of PlayStation Portable's most popular shooter games, Killzone®: Liberation and Syphon Filter®: Logan's Shadow, are now available in a Dual Pack. The Helghast return with superb shooting action and high intensity graphics making Killzone® Liberation a huge hit on PSP®. Desperate. Alone. Betrayed. A follow up to Dark Mirror the robust online content available for Logan's Shadow catapult this title to a top PSP® seller.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

"Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow © 2007 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Syphon Filter is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Killzone: Liberation © 2006 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Killzone is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Guerrilla."
